medical_history.chief_complaint: Confusion and abdominal pain for 1 day
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 day ago, with progressive confusion and somnolence. The patient reported worsening lower mid-abdominal pain and nausea, along with poor oral intake and appetite. No episodes of emesis have occurred. The patient has been passing flatus and had a bowel movement the day prior, with no fevers or chills. No prior episodes of similar symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dementia, Diabetes Mellitus, Hypertension, Hypothyroidism, Hypercholesterolemia, Osteoarthritis, Osteoporosis, Insomnia, Anxiety, Hearing loss.
medical_history.family_history: Father deceased, mother deceased; the patient does not know their health conditions. Multiple children with Diabetes Mellitus Type 2.
